meta_description: Kentuck's mission is to perpetuate the arts, engage the community, and empower the artist. The Kentuck Festival of the Arts is held annually in October, and during that weekend, makes a $5.5 million economic impact on its community.
admission_text:
[Haga clic aquí para español](https://www.kentuck.org/el-festival-de-kentuck)

## experience the kentuck festival

October 17-18, 2026 at Snow Hinton Park in Tuscaloosa, Alabama! Scroll down for information about tickets and VIP packages.

## get your tickets  
to #kentuck55

Get your general admission tickets to the 54th Kentuck Festival! 

$15 single day pass

$25 weekend pass

*Kids 12 & under get in free

Pets are not allowed at the Kentuck Festival of the Arts.

​

Online ticket sales start on August 1, 2026 and end Oct 15 at 12pm CST. After that time, tickets are available at the front gate when you arrive at the festival! 

[tickets on sale august 1](https://www.eventeny.com/events/the-54th-kentuck-festival-of-the-arts-2025-18313/)

WHAT: the 55th Kentuck Festival of the Arts

WHEN: October 17-18, 2026; Saturday 9am-5pm, Sunday 9am-5pm

*VIPs get early shopping at 8am Saturday. 

WHERE: 

[Snow Hinton Park](https://maps.app.goo.gl/FH9QVwfdSvtF1YeR9)

(21 Street East entrance)

Tuscaloosa, Alabama 35405

​

Attending the event? Sign up for weather updates and other alerts by texting "KENTUCK2025" to 888777.

Kentuck has a rich 54-year history as a nationally known crossroads of creativity and community. The two-day festival has its roots in folk art and features 270+ artists, live music, spoken word, activities for children, folk and contemporary craft demonstrations, food trucks, and local craft brews. Want to know more event details? [Click here](https://www.kentuck.o...
collections_text:
# kentuck

# art center & festival

# what does kentuck do?

# Kentuck Art Center offers programs to support the arts, connect with the community, and help artists grow. Through a mix of free and paid activities like Art Nights, workshops, Boxes of Joy, and the Kentuck Festival of the Arts, we strive to make art accessible to everyone. We invite you to browse our [Gallery Shop](https://shop.kentuck.org/), register for your next favorite [workshop](https://workshops.kentuck.org/), apply to exhibit your work at the [Kentuck Festival](https://www.kentuck.org/the-festival), or visit us for an [Art Market!](https://www.kentuck.org)

[learn more about kentuck ](https://www.kentuck.org/about)

[donate ](https://www.kentuck.org/donate)

create

# Unleash your creativity by signing up for a workshop today–fun for all ages!

# [Learn More >](https://workshops.kentuck.org/)

# join our ken-folk

# When you support Kentuck, you play a key role in building and sustaining a vibrant arts community that enriches the cultural fabric of West Alabama. Members get great perks, including complimentary beer or wine at Art Nights, discounts in the Gallery Shop, and discounts on workshops!

[join the kentuck family ](https://www.kentuck.org/become-a-member)

# upcoming events

[Kentuck's Art Nights](https://www.kentuck.org/free-events)

First Thursday of the month, 5-8pm. Free and family-friendly.
